Detailed Description

MessageMapDispatcher with a ready-to-use active wait implementation.

BOOLEAN ActiveWaitDispatcher::Wait (  UINT32  timeout = 0  )  [virtual]
 

Parameters:
timeout timeout period in milliseconds to return from Wait without fulfilling the condition.
Returns:
TRUE if the condition has been fulfilled, FALSE if the timer is expired.
